START: ^“Hey Mayor, a carpenter and his family have come to town. He doesn’t have any money but needs food and a place to stay. He says he can pay us back with free labor.
CHOICES: ^Ask him to build something for a test.
TRUST: ^“That’s great, Mayor! We have some new people to do work around here, could definitely help the town out.”
NOT_TRUST: ^“Mayor, we just lost a good deal, it looks like he could’ve helped us out.”
TEST: ^“Well Mayor, at least we got something.”
